name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SMS via Email by Don Li

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send SMS messages via email by Don Li. © 2024 Don Li. All rights reserved. This extension allows users to send SMS via email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension would be perfect for you when you want to send a simple email to someone and you also have that person's mobile phone number and you want the same email to show up in his/her SMS as a message.  Thus, that person would get your message one way or another.

Currently support US mobile carriers only.

Send SMS messages via email by Don Li.
